text: Ramón Echarren Istúriz (November 13, 1929 - August 25, 2014) was a Spanish Roman Catholic bishop. Istúriz ordained to the priesthood in 1958. Istúriz was appointed titular bishop of 'Diano' and auxiliary bishop of the Roman Catholic Archdiocese of Madrid, Spain, in 1969. In 1978, he was appointed bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Canarias and retired in 2005.Ramon Echerran Isturiz ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Spanish Roman Catholic bishops Category:Canary Islands
title: Ramón Echarren Istúriz
